t = int(input())
for i in range(t):

    (Og, Oy, Or) = map(int, input().split())
    (pg, py, pr) = map(int, input().split())
    a = []
    x1 = mg + my + mr
    y1 = Og + Oy + Or
    z1 = pg + py + pr
    x2 = mg + Og + pg
    y2 = my + Oy + py
    z2 = mr + Or + pr
    a.extend((x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2))
    b = max(a)
    if b % 2 != 0 or b == 0:
        print(b)

        print(b - 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (mg, my, mr) = map(int, input().split())
    (og, oy, Or) = map(int, input().split())
    (pg, py, pr) = map(int, input().split())
    leaves = []
    colors = []
    v1 = mg + my + mr
    y1 = mg + og + pg
    if v1 % 2 == 0:
        v1 = v1 - 1
    leaves.append(v1)
    if y1 % 2 == 0:
        y1 = y1 - 1
    colors.append(y1)
    v2 = og + oy + Or
    y2 = my + oy + py
    if v2 % 2 == 0:
        v2 = v2 - 1
    leaves.append(v2)
    if y2 % 2 == 0:
        y2 = y2 - 1
    colors.append(y2)
    v3 = pg + py + pr
    y3 = mr + Or + pr
    if v3 % 2 == 0:
        v3 = v3 - 1
    leaves.append(v3)
    if y3 % 2 == 0:
        y3 = y3 - 1
    colors.append(y3)
    t1 = leaves + colors
    f = max(t1)
    if f <= 0:
        print(0)
    else:
        print(f)

t = int(input())
while t:

    t = t - 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr = [m, o, p]
    total = []
    (g, y, r) = (0, 0, 0)
    for i in arr:
        total.append(sum(i))
        g += i[0]
        y += i[1]
        r += i[2]
    total.append(g)
    total.append(y)
    total.append(r)
    h = 0
    for i in range(6):
        if total[i] % 2 == 0:
            total[i] -= 1
        if h < total[i]:
            h = total[i]
    print(h)

    f = max(list1)

        print(f - 1)
    else:
        print(f)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    M = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    O = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    P = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    A = []
    count = 0
    for j in range(3):
        count += M[j]
    A.append(count)
    count = 0
    for j in range(3):
        count += O[j]
    A.append(count)
    count = 0
    for j in range(3):
        count += P[j]
    A.append(count)
    count = 0
    A.append(M[0] + O[0] + P[0])
    A.append(M[1] + O[1] + P[1])
    A.append(M[2] + O[2] + P[2])
    if max(A) % 2 == 0 and max(A) != 0:
        print(max(A) - 1)
    elif max(A) == 0:
        print(0)
    else:
        print(max(A))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):

    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    g = m[0] + o[0] + p[0]
    y = m[1] + o[1] + p[1]
    r = m[2] + o[2] + p[2]
    tm = sum(m)
    to = sum(o)
    tp = sum(p)
    if not g % 2:
        g -= 1
    if not y % 2:
        y -= 1
    if not r % 2:
        r -= 1
    if not tm % 2:
        tm -= 1
    if not to % 2:
        to -= 1
    if not tp % 2:
        tp -= 1
    ans = [g, r, y, tm, to, tp]
    if max(ans) >= 0:
        print(max(ans))
    else:
        print(0)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lis = []
    g = m[0] + o[0] + p[0]
    y = m[1] + o[1] + p[1]
    r = m[2] + o[2] + p[2]
    lis.append(sum(m))
    lis.append(sum(o))
    lis.append(sum(p))
    lis.append(g)
    lis.append(y)
    lis.append(r)
    if max(lis) == 0:
        print(0)
    elif max(lis) % 2 == 0:
        print(max(lis) - 1)
    elif max(lis) % 2 != 0:
        print(max(lis))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lis = []
    lis.append(sum(m))
    lis.append(sum(o))
    lis.append(sum(p))
    sm = 0
    for i in range(len(m)):
        x = m[i] + o[i] + p[i]
        sm += x
        lis.append(sm)
        sm = 0
    if max(lis) % 2 == 0:
        if max(lis) - 1 > 0:
            print(max(lis) - 1)
        else:
            print(0)
    else:
        print(max(lis))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (m1, m2, m3) = map(int, input().split())
    (o1, o2, o3) = map(int, input().split())
    (p1, p2, p3) = map(int, input().split())
    maxm = 0
    maxm = max(maxm, m1 + m2 + m3)
    maxm = max(maxm, o1 + o2 + o3)
    maxm = max(maxm, p1 + p2 + p3)
    maxm = max(maxm, m1 + o1 + p1)
    maxm = max(maxm, m2 + o2 + p2)
    maxm = max(maxm, m3 + o3 + p3)
    if maxm % 2 == 1:
        print(maxm)
    elif maxm == 0:
        print(0)
    else:
        print(maxm - 1)

get_int = lambda : int(input())
get_mint = lambda : list(map(int, input().split()))
for _ in range(get_int()):
    maple = get_mint()
    oak = get_mint()
    poplar = get_mint()
    leaves_from_same_tree = max([sum(maple), sum(oak), sum(poplar)])
    color_leaves = max([maple[i] + oak[i] + poplar[i] for i in range(3)])
    bouquet = max(leaves_from_same_tree, color_leaves)
    if bouquet == 0:
        print(0)
        continue
    if not bouquet % 2:
        bouquet -= 1
    print(bouquet)

from sys import stdin, stdout
stdint = lambda : int(stdin.readline())
mul = lambda : map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split())
for _ in range(stdint()):
    (m_g, m_y, m_r) = mul()
    (o_g, o_y, o_r) = mul()
    (p_g, p_y, p_r) = mul()
    maxVal = max(m_g + m_y + m_r, o_g + o_y + o_r, p_g + p_y + p_r)
    maxVal = max(maxVal, m_g + o_g + p_g, m_y + o_y + p_y, m_r + o_r + p_r)
    if maxVal and maxVal % 2 == 0:
        maxVal -= 1
    print(maxVal)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (m_g, m_y, m_r) = map(int, input().split())
    (o_g, o_y, o_r) = map(int, input().split())
    (p_g, p_y, p_r) = map(int, input().split())
    t_m = m_g + m_y + m_r
    t_o = o_g + o_y + o_r
    t_p = p_g + p_y + p_r
    t_g = m_g + o_g + p_g
    t_y = m_y + o_y + p_y
    t_r = m_r + o_r + p_r
    a = max(t_m, t_o, t_p, t_r, t_y, t_g)
    if t_m == 0 and t_o == 0 and (t_p == 0) and (t_r == 0) and (t_y == 0) and (t_g == 0):
        print(0)
    elif a % 2 == 0:
        print(a - 1)
    else:
        print(a)

for i in range(int(input())):
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total_leaves = []
    total_leaves.append(sum(m))
    total_leaves.append(sum(o))
    total_leaves.append(sum(p))
    max1 = []
    ma = max(total_leaves)
    if ma % 2 != 0:
        max1.append(ma)
    else:
        max1.append(ma - 1)
    colour_leaves = []
    colour_leaves.append(m[0] + o[0] + p[0])
    colour_leaves.append(m[1] + o[1] + p[1])
    colour_leaves.append(m[2] + o[2] + p[2])
    ma1 = max(colour_leaves)
    if ma1 % 2 != 0:
        max1.append(ma1)
    else:
        max1.append(ma1 - 1)
    mo = max(max1)
    if mo > 0:
        print(mo)
    else:
        print(0)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (Mg, My, Mr) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    (Og, Oy, Or) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    (Pg, Py, Pr) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    (M, O, P) = (Mg + My + Mr, Og + Oy + Or, Pg + Py + Pr)
    (g, y, r) = (Mg + Og + Pg, My + Oy + Py, Mr + Or + Pr)
    l = [M, O, P, g, y, r]
    for i in range(6):
        if l[i] % 2 == 0:
            l[i] -= 1
    l.append(0)
    print(max(l))

n = int(input())
while n:
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
    (i, j, k) = map(int, input().split())
    (x, y, z) = map(int, input().split())
    l = []
    l.append(a + b + c)
    l.append(i + j + k)
    l.append(x + y + z)
    l.append(a + i + x)
    l.append(b + j + y)
    l.append(c + k + z)
    for q in range(len(l)):
        if l[q] % 2 == 0:
            l[q] = l[q] - 1
    l.append(0)
    print(max(l))
    n = n - 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    M = list(map(int, input().split()))
    O = list(map(int, input().split()))
    P = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = 3
    maxi = max(sum(M), sum(O), sum(P))
    for i in range(s):
        a = M[i] + O[i] + P[i]
        maxi = max(maxi, a)
    if maxi % 2 == 0 and maxi != 0:
        maxi -= 1
    print(maxi)

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    (mg, my, mr) = map(int, input().split())
    (og, oy, orr) = map(int, input().split())
    (pg, py, pr) = map(int, input().split())
    bouquets = []
    bouquets.append(mg + my + mr)
    bouquets.append(og + oy + orr)
    bouquets.append(pg + py + pr)
    bouquets.append(mg + og + pg)
    bouquets.append(my + oy + py)
    bouquets.append(mr + orr + pr)
    j = 0
    while j < len(bouquets):
        if bouquets[j] % 2 == 0:
            bouquets[j] -= 1
        j += 1
    bouquets.append(0)
    print(max(bouquets))
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    M = list(map(int, input().split()))
    O = list(map(int, input().split()))
    P = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = 0
    for i in range(3):
        t = M[i] + O[i] + P[i]
        m = max(m, t)
    f = max(sum(M), sum(O), sum(P), m)
    if f % 2 == 0 and f != 0:
        f -= 1
    print(f)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    M = list(map(int, input().split()))
    O = list(map(int, input().split()))
    P = list(map(int, input().split()))
    max_color = 0
    for i in range(3):
        temp = M[i] + O[i] + P[i]
        max_color = max(max_color, temp)
    maximal_flowers = max(sum(M), sum(O), sum(P), max_color)
    if maximal_flowers % 2 == 0 and maximal_flowers != 0:
        maximal_flowers -= 1
    print(maximal_flowers)

tst = int(input())
for i in range(tst):
    (m1, m2, m3) = map(int, input().split())
    (o1, o2, o3) = map(int, input().split())
    (p1, p2, p3) = map(int, input().split())
    ms = m1 + m2 + m3
    os = o1 + o2 + o3
    ps = p1 + p2 + p3
    s1 = m1 + o1 + p1
    s2 = m2 + o2 + p2
    s3 = m3 + o3 + p3
    ans = max(ms, os, ps, s1, s2, s3)
    if ans == 0:
        ans = 0
    elif ans % 2 == 0:
        ans = ans - 1
    else:
        ans = ans
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    list_final = []
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    o = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    list_final.append(sum(m))
    list_final.append(sum(o))
    list_final.append(sum(p))
    list_final.append(m[0] + o[0] + p[0])
    list_final.append(m[1] + o[1] + p[1])
    list_final.append(m[2] + o[2] + p[2])
    temp = max(list_final)
    if temp % 2 == 0 and temp != 0:
        print(temp - 1)
    else:
        print(temp)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = max(sum(a1), sum(a2), sum(a3))
    for j in range(3):
        m = max(m, a1[j] + a2[j] + a3[j])
    if m % 2 == 0 and m != 0:
        m -= 1
    print(m)

tests = int(input())
for i in range(tests):
    arr1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr3 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    maximum = max(sum(arr1), sum(arr2), sum(arr3))
    for j in range(3):
        maximum = max(maximum, arr1[j] + arr2[j] + arr3[j])
    if maximum % 2 == 0 and maximum != 0:
        maximum -= 1
    print(maximum)
